level.heading: Rates of horse drawn cabs.
level.text: ยง20-380. Rates of horse drawn cabs. The amount to be charged and collected for the use of a horse drawn cab by one or more passengers shall be the total of the following items: fifty dollars for the first twenty minutes or fraction thereof and twenty dollars for each additional ten minutes thereafter. Such rates shall be indexed for inflation based on the Consumer Price Index every three years.
